ing: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna packed in water, drained
4 1-pint canning jars with lids and rings
n: Mason Jar Egg and Tuna Salad
des: "Make these on Sunday and have 4 meals ready for lunches or dinners during the week!"
ins: Mix eggs, mayonnaise, and seasoned salt together in a bowl; spoon evenly among 4 pint jars. Layer pickles, tuna, and arugula on top of mayonnaise mixture. Cover tightly with lid and refrigerate.
